tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE defects(
  defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  defect_description TEXT,
  defect_date DATE,
  root_cause TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE RootCauseAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_id INT,
    root_cause_description TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (defect_id) REFERENCES ProductDefects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE defect_tracking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    defect_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    defect_description TEXT,
    detection_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE root_cause_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_id INT,
    root_cause TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (defect_id) REFERENCES defect_tracking(id)
);

CREATE TABLE defect_location (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    location_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (defect_id) REFERENCES defect_tracking(id)
);

CREATE TABLE defect_resolution (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_id INT,
    resolution TEXT,
    resolution_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (defect_id) REFERENCES defect_tracking(id)
);

CREATE TABLE defects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    defect_date DATE,
    defect_category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_type VARCHAR(50),
    production_date DATE,
    supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE root_cause_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_id INT NOT NULL,
    root_cause TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analyzed_by VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE product_history (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    defect_id INT,
    history_date DATE,
    action_taken TEXT
);
